  2. Capcom finally explains what a 'deluxe remaster' actually is, then asks which of its series you want to get the treatment next  PC Gamer
  3. Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster Review  IGN
  4. Capcom asks fans if they want remakes/remasters of Dino Crisis & Devil May Cry etc  My Nintendo News
  5. Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster Brings Back The Cut Beam Gun, Kinda  TheGamer
